top.title: A 10-year-old, two rabbis and a Holocaust survivor - Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
top.summary: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

top.title: Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele found dead in LA home
top.summary: He directed classic films including The Princess Bride, This is Spinal Tap and When Harry Met Sally.

top.title: Ukraine ceasefire talks continue as US says 'progress was made'
top.summary: The discussions are centred around the peace plan presented by Kyiv to the US last week.

top.title: Ofcom investigates BT and Three for failing to connect 999 calls
top.summary: The companies have been fined in the past over outages leaving customers unable to call emergency services.

top.title: Grand Theft Auto game creator sacked us for trying to unionise
top.summary: Former staff at the Grand Theft Auto creator are seeking an employment tribunal over alleged "union-busting".

top.title: Roomba vacuum cleaner firm files for bankruptcy
top.summary: Under the so-called pre-packaged Chapter 11 process, the main maker of its devices will take ownership of the firm.
